CustomField.formula: IF (SellInTaxAmountJPY__c = null || SellInTaxAmountJPY__c = 0, 0, ( SellInTaxAmountJPY__c - BuyInTaxAmountJPY__c) / SellInTaxAmountJPY__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Profit Ratio Include Tax=(\R\Nprofit Include Tax(FCY)=Amount Selling including Tax(FCY)-Amount Buying including Tax(FCY))/Amount Selling including Tax(FCY)
CustomField.label: PROFIT RATIO INCLUDE TAX
